ferrets: Honk Xiu

""

Shush Now! Now Shush!
Now Shush Shush And Shoo!
Honk Xiu Is Dreaming Of Chicken To Chew! 
So Quiet Now, Bumpkin
Choose Between Two-
It Matters Not What You Decide Not To Do 
But Rather How Farther You Patter On Past This Pew 


*(Who Knows What To Do?)*

Will It Be The [[Next One|Nice Lady]]
With Her Nose In Some Lace?

Or Perhaps The Back Row?
To That Lick-Sticky Place?
